duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete maintenance customer service, inventory, and administrative processes to support maintenance operational efficiency, effectiveness, customer satisfaction, and profitability.
Maintain optimal inventory levels through ordering parts and receiving and storing parts in an organized manner.
Perform process analyses and reviews in areas such as inventory, maintenance profitability, and warranty campaigns.
Support the branch financial manager by providing guidance and information that contributes to branch performance and profitability.
Greet customers, respond to inquiries, and provide phone service.
Collaborate with branch team members and provide superior customer service and communication to internal and external customers.
Manage new & used battery inventory, ensure availability of tires, and manage warranty items and returns.
Investigate issues posing a risk to profitability and recommend solutions and/or guidance.
Projects and tasks as assigned by Branch Financial Manager and District Financial Manager.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, degree preferred
